xp_formula.description: XP = Base XP × Dimension Multiplier × Completion Factor

parameters.completion_factor: 0.0 - 1.0 based on progress toward badge criteria

dimension_scoring.description: Dimension scores are calculated from 0.0 to 1.0 based on badge unlocks and ongoing activities
dimension_scoring.formula: Weighted average of badge completion + activity consistency + quality metrics

anti_gaming_rules.description: Journal entries must meet minimum word count and depth requirements
anti_gaming_rules.enforcement: Entries below 50 words don't count toward emotional growth badges
Entries must show varied sentiment (not all same emotion tag)
Streak badges require entries on separate days (not all same day)

anti_gaming_rules.description: All XP changes must be logged
anti_gaming_rules.enforcement: Event log required for every badge unlock and XP award
Gatekeeper agent must approve all Legendary unlocks

metadata.philosophy: No hollow rewards. Every badge reflects truth earned through experience.
